function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fragile health security capacities leading to ineffective handling of COVID-19","Impact":"Continued threat to the well-being of people and nations worldwide","Mitigation":"Strengthening health security capacities, international cooperation for resource distribution","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, international aid tracking systems","People":"People in countries with fragile health security capacities","Owner":"World health organizations, national governments"},{"Description":"Neglect of public health challenges in developing countries due to inward focus of developed economies","Impact":"Increased burden on already stretched health systems in developing countries","Mitigation":"International solidarity, equal access to equipment and materials for developing countries","Technologies":"Resource distribution platforms, telemedicine","People":"Public health organizations, governments of developed and developing countries","Owner":"International organizations, governments of developed countries"},{"Description":"Delay in the implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) due to socio-economic pressures and set-backs","Impact":"Lowered priority given to SDGs, potential undermining of poverty eradication and hunger fighting efforts","Mitigation":"Continued emphasis on SDGs implementation, international cooperation for SDGs progress","Technologies":"Monitoring and reporting systems for SDGs progress, international collaboration platforms","People":"Global development organizations, governments of all nations","Owner":"Global development organizations, national governments"}]}
